member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.BarcodeForeground
member.summary: Foreground color for Codebar generation. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.BarcodeBackground
member.summary: Background color for Codebar generation. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.BarcodeWidth
member.summary: Width of generated Barcode image. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.BarcodeHeight
member.summary: Height of generated Barcode image. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.BarcodeMargin
member.summary: Margin of generated Barcode image. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.BarcodeFormat
member.summary: Barcode Format for the generated image. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.Barcode
member.summary: Barcode string to Encode. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.BarcodeImage.Aspect
member.summary: Scale mode for the image. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.FlashMode
member.summary: Flash mode for take a photo. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.TorchEnabled
member.summary: Turns the camera torch on and off if available. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.Cameras
member.summary: List of available cameras in the device. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.NumCamerasDetected
member.summary: Indicates the number of available cameras in the device.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.Camera
member.summary: Set the camera to use by the controler. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.Microphones
member.summary: List of available microphones in the device. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.NumMicrophonesDetected
member.summary: Indicates the number of available microphones in the device.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.Microphone
member.summary: Set the microphone to use by the controler. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.MirroredImage
member.summary: Turns a mirror image of the camera on and off. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.BarCodeDetectionEnabled
member.summary: Turns on and off the barcode detection. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.BarCodeDetectionFrameRate
member.summary: Indicates every how many frames the control tries to detect a barcode in the image. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.BarCodeDetectionMaxThreads
member.summary: Indicates the maximun number of simultaneous running threads for barcode detection

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.BarCodeOptions
member.summary: Options for the barcode detection. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.BarCodeResults
member.summary: It refresh each time a barcode is detected if BarCodeDetectionEnabled porperty is true

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.ZoomFactor
member.summary: The zoom factor for the current camera in use. This is a bindable property.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.MinZoomFactor
member.summary: Indicates the minimum zoom factor for the camera in use. This property is refreshed when the "Camera" property change.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.MaxZoomFactor
member.summary: Indicates the maximum zoom factor for the camera in use. This property is refreshed when the "Camera" property change.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.AutoSnapShotSeconds
member.summary: Sets how often the SnapShot property is updated in seconds. Default 0: no snapshots are taken WARNING! A low frequency directly impacts over control performance and memory usage (with AutoSnapShotAsImageSource = true)

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.AutoSnapShotFormat
member.summary: Sets the snaphost image format

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.SnapShot
member.summary: Refreshes according to the frequency set in the AutoSnapShotSeconds property (if AutoSnapShotAsImageSource is set to true) or when GetSnapShot is called or TakeAutoSnapShot is set to true

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.SnapShotStream
member.summary: Refreshes according to the frequency set in the AutoSnapShotSeconds property or when GetSnapShot is called. WARNING. Each time a snapshot is made, the previous stream is disposed.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.TakeAutoSnapShot
member.summary: Change from false to true refresh SnapShot property

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.AutoSnapShotAsImageSource
member.summary: If true SnapShot property is refreshed according to the frequency set in the AutoSnapShotSeconds property

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.AutoStartPreview
member.summary: Starts/Stops the Preview if camera property has been set

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.AutoRecordingFile
member.summary: Full path to file where record video will be recorded.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.AutoStartRecording
member.summary: Starts/Stops record video to AutoRecordingFile if camera and microphone properties have been set

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.ControlBarcodeResultDuplicate
member.summary: If true BarcodeDetected event will invoke only if a Results is diferent from preview Results

member.name: E:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.BarcodeDetected
member.summary: Event launched every time a code is detected in the image if "BarCodeDetectionEnabled" is set to true.

member.name: E:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.CamerasLoaded
member.summary: Event launched when "Cameras" property has been loaded.

member.name: E:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.MicrophonesLoaded
member.summary: Event launched when "Microphones" property has been loaded.

member.name: P:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.Current
member.summary: A static reference to the last CameraView created.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.StartCameraAsync(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Size)
member.summary: Start playback of the selected camera async. "Camera" property must not be null. Indicates the resolution for the preview and photos taken with TakePhotoAsync (must be in Camera.AvailableResolutions). If width or height is 0, max resolution will be taken.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.StartRecordingAsync(System.String,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Size)
member.summary: Start recording a video async. "Camera" property must not be null. Full path to file where video will be stored. Sets the Video Resolution. It must be in Camera.AvailableResolutions. If width or height is 0, max resolution will be taken.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.StopCameraAsync
member.summary: Stop playback of the selected camera async.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.StopRecordingAsync
member.summary: Stop recording a video async.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.TakePhotoAsync(Camera.MAUI.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Takes a photo from the camera selected.
member.returns: A stream with the photo info

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.GetSnapShot(Camera.MAUI.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Takes a capture form the active camera playback.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.SaveSnapShot(Camera.MAUI.ImageFormat,System.String)
member.summary: Saves a capture form the active camera playback in a file

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.ForceAutoFocus
member.summary: Force execute the camera autofocus trigger.

member.name: M:Camera.MAUI.CameraView.ForceDisposeHandler
member.summary: Forces the device specific control dispose
